__e: I am offering you an alliance with a man who goes to work everyday at 1600 Pennsylvania Avenue!
But rest assured, your wife and daughter will be released the second our friend on Pennsylvania Avenue is dead.
Your wife and daughter will be released the second our friend on Pennsylvania Avenue is dead.
Let me tell you, brother, I step out the door, hit the corner of Mosher and Pennsylvania, you better believe my pockets are bulging.
But I'll try New York, and then Pennsylvania. And we'll go from there.
If I must, I promise to personally visit Pennsylvania and shoot your father in the head.
